channel.title: Adding regular items help
channel.description: how do i add regular items to my client like a whip, or full black gold exc.

item.title: Adding regular items help
item.dc:creator: @jake_93 jake_93
item.description:
@jake_93 wrote:

You will be needing to add the models for each of the items to your models section,
Then you will have to add a int for each item into your class8.java.
Compile.

Enjoy.
(Somewhere through this you will have to log in and type add models; im sure its after you add the models to your models folder.)

Befour you do that its worth finding out the codes for the items to check if they are ingame cos mostly they will be unless they are custom items.
(Id’s usually found in client - Notes - Item id’s)
If not then you will have to search up for them.

Hope i helped,
Jake

Read full topic
